text: Hello all, my name is Arif and I'm a sophomore *majoring in Electrical Engineering*. My interests lie in Signal processing, Communications and *Computations*. I love math, and I was introduced to Julia by my course instructor. I want to contribute to Julia, and it would be really helpful if anyone can nudge me in the right direction to get started. I will follow your direction to become a value-adding community member. (I know Julia, C++, and Web Dev, if it helps in guiding me.)

text: Yes <@U0179G7FG4F> I was going through some of the issues on the GitHub page of Julia, and found it quite intimidating as to where do I start. Can you point out any specific issue from the GitHub page of Julia, which a newbie like me can resolve as a first issue.
